mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT STORE_ID AS storeId, NAME AS name, LOCATION AS location, DESCRIPTION AS description, START_DATE AS startDate, END_DATE AS endDate, VIEWS AS views, CREATED_BY AS createdBy, STATUS AS status, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY STORE_ID DESC) AS RN FROM POPUPSTORES WHERE STATUS = 0 ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POPUPSTORES WHERE STATUS = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POPUPSTORES WHERE STATUS = 0
SELECT * FROM POPUPSTORES WHERE STORE_ID > 0 AND STATUS = 1 ORDER BY STORE_ID

SELECT * FROM POPUPSTORES WHERE ((UPPER(LOCATION) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%' OR #{keyword} IS NULL) OR (UPPER(NAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%' OR #{keyword} IS NULL) OR (UPPER(DESCRIPTION) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%' OR #{keyword} IS NULL)) AND STATUS = 1 ORDER BY START_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POPUPSTORE_LOCATIONS (STORE_ID, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE) VALUES (#{storeId}, #{latitude}, #{longitude})
mapper.select: SELECT a.STORE_ID, a.LATITUDE, a.LONGITUDE, b.NAME AS TITLE FROM POPUPSTORE_LOCATIONS a JOIN POPUPSTORES b ON a.STORE_ID = b.STORE_ID
